A CAE specific direct modeling and meshing solution software that streamlines CAD clean-up, simplification and meshing workflow. This solution is unique in that it combines computational parts and assemblies technology with a generative framework, which enables interactive and incremental analysis.	It provides a truly end to end solution for designers making high-precision, industrial components.
